sleep:
Write(you sleep on the floor)
Condition(sleep, +1)
Condition(health, -1)

unlock:
Prop(check, locked)
Item(require, key)
Prop(update, locked, open)
Item(destroy, key)

Item(destroy)

break:
Write(the table breaks)
Item(destroy)
Item(create, stick, 4)

turn on:
Prop(check, off)
Prop(check value, battery)
Prop(enable, battery)
Prop(create, type / source of light)
Prop(update, off, on)
turn off:
Prop(check, on)
Prop(remove, source of light)
Prop(disable, battery)
Prop(update, on, off)
charge:
Item(require, battery)
Prop(update, battery, +10)
Item(destroy, battery)

water:
Prop(check, !dead)
Prop(require, water)
Prop(update, drying, +*water)
Prop(disable, drying)
Prop(update, fine, +*water)
Prop(enable, fine)

empty:
Prop(check value, water)
Item(create, puddle)
Prop(update, *puddle, water, *water)
